languages.text: Друкхарская ванна и всякие реагенты, похоже кто-то устроил тут себе косметологический кабинет (успех чека)

traits.locale_text: Друкхарская ванна и всякие реагенты, похоже кто-то устроил тут себе косметологический кабинет (успех чека)

languages.text: Это место напоминает кабинет реювенации. Жуткий вид окружающих ванную приборов намекает на их принадлежность к друкарским технологиям.
This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.
languages.original_text: Это место напоминает кабинет реювенации. Жуткий вид окружающих ванную приборов намекает на их принадлежность к друкарским технологиям.

traits.locale_text: This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.
This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.
This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

languages.text: Der Ort erinnert entfernt an eine Kammer für Verjüngungsbehandlungen. Das unheimliche Aussehen der um die Wanne herum installierten Geräte legt ihre Drukhari-Herkunft nahe.
languages.original_text: This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

traits.locale_text: Der Ort erinnert entfernt an eine Kammer für Verjüngungsbehandlungen. Das unheimliche Aussehen der um die Wanne herum installierten Geräte legt ihre Drukhari-Herkunft nahe.

languages.text: Cet endroit ressemble vaguement aux chambres utilisées pour les traitements du Rejuvenat. L'aspect étrange des installations qui entourent la vasque trahit leur origine drukharie.
languages.original_text: This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

traits.locale_text: Cet endroit ressemble vaguement aux chambres utilisées pour les traitements du Rejuvenat. L'aspect étrange des installations qui entourent la vasque trahit leur origine drukharie.

languages.text: 这个地方看起来有点像用来举行返老还童疗法的治疗室。浴缸周围的设备散发着邪恶气息，明显是黑暗灵族的造物。
languages.original_text: This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

traits.locale_text: 这个地方看起来有点像用来举行返老还童疗法的治疗室。浴缸周围的设备散发着邪恶气息，明显是黑暗灵族的造物。

languages.text: Este lugar recuerda vagamente a una cámara de tratamientos de rejuvenecimiento. La siniestra apariencia de los dispositivos instalados en torno a la bañera sugiere un origen Drukhari.
languages.original_text: This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

traits.locale_text: Este lugar recuerda vagamente a una cámara de tratamientos de rejuvenecimiento. La siniestra apariencia de los dispositivos instalados en torno a la bañera sugiere un origen Drukhari.

languages.text: ここは若返り処置に使用される部屋に似ている。浴槽の周りに設置された装置の不気味な外観は、それらがデュカーリのものであることを示唆している。
languages.original_text: This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

traits.locale_text: ここは若返り処置に使用される部屋に似ている。浴槽の周りに設置された装置の不気味な外観は、それらがデュカーリのものであることを示唆している。

languages.text: Burası gençleştirme tedavileri için kullanılan odalara benziyor. Küvetin etrafına yerleştirilen cihazların ürpertici görünümüyse tüm bunların Drukhari kökenli olduğuna işaret ediyor.
languages.original_text: This place vaguely resembles a chamber used for rejuvenat treatments. The sinister appearance of the devices installed all around the tub suggests their Drukhari origin.

traits.locale_text: Burası gençleştirme tedavileri için kullanılan odalara benziyor. Küvetin etrafına yerleştirilen cihazların ürpertici görünümüyse tüm bunların Drukhari kökenli olduğuna işaret ediyor.
